etomica.space

Interface RotationTensor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Tensor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RotationTensor2D, RotationTensor3D

    public interface RotationTensor
extends Tensor
    A tensor intended for use to define rotations in space. Includes methods to set its components in terms of rotation angles.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void reset()
      Sets tensor to a condition of no rotation.
      void setAxial(int i, double theta)
